revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Aruba Networks RAP-108]] to [[Aruba Networks RAP-108 (APINR108)]]: fixed ;
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aruba Networks |model=RAP-108 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/12/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=Q9DAPINR108109 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.arubanetworks.com/pdf/products/DS_RAP-100.pdf Datasheet for the RAP-100 series] :10/100/1000 Uplink port, 10/100 local port
An '''Acradyan''' / '''Accton''' P/N is on the PCB in the FCC photos. The label in the external photos states the device is made in Taiwan. :The Flash chip for this device appears to be a 16MB MX25L12845EMI-10G.
Possible 6C:F3:7F OUI (on a label in the FCC photos)
